Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial

Interface DynamicTutorial<T,​V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    androidx.viewpager.widget.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicTutorial.SharedElement<T,​V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicSimpleTutorial, DynamicTutorialFragment
    public interface DynamicTutorial<T,​V>
extends androidx.viewpager.widget.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    Interface for the dynamic tutorial having useful methods which will be called by the DynamicTutorialActivity to perform color transitions.

    Any child view or fragment must implement this interface to support any color transitions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  DynamicTutorial.SharedElement<T,​V>
      A DynamicTutorial to support shared element(s) transition.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.lang.String ADS_NAME_TUTORIAL_SUBTITLE
      Activity scene transition name for the tutorial subtitle.
      static java.lang.String ADS_NAME_TUTORIAL_TITLE
      Activity scene transition name for the tutorial title.

      • onBackgroundColorChanged

        void onBackgroundColorChanged​(@ColorInt
                              int color)
        This method will be called when there is a change in the background color of the activity.

        Implement this method to update any views during the transition.

        Parameters:
        color - The color of the background.

      • onSetPadding

        void onSetPadding​(int left,
                  int top,
                  int right,
                  int bottom)
        This method will be called on setting the padding of the tutorial.

        Implement this method to update any views according to the container.

        Parameters:
        left - The left padding supplied by the container.
        top - The top padding supplied by the container.
        right - The right padding supplied by the container.
        bottom - The bottom padding supplied by the container.
